statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT device_id, sensor_value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = 101 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type LIKE 'Humidity%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='temperature' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='humidity' ORDER BY timestamp ASC, sensor_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY sensor_value ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT MAX(sensor_value) FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM device_info;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, device_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location, last_updated FROM device_info WHERE location <> 'HQ' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(sensor_type) AS sensor_count FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING sensor_count > 100 ORDER BY sensor_count DESC;
SELECT MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value, MIN(sensor_value) AS min_value FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING avg_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM Sensors ORDER BY reading DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, reading_time FROM Sensors WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location FROM Devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'sensor%';
SELECT sensor_name, reading FROM Sensors WHERE reading > 50;
SELECT sensor_name, reading_time FROM Sensors WHERE reading_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT device_name, location FROM Devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, reading, reading_time FROM Sensors WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, AVG(reading) AS average_reading FROM Sensors GROUP BY sensor_name;
SELECT s.sensor_name, sl.reading, sl.reading_time FROM Sensors s JOIN SensorLogs sl ON s.id = sl.sensor_id;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sensors FROM Devices d JOIN Sensors s ON d.device_id = s.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT avg(value) AS average_value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, value, timestamp FROM sensors WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, value, timestamp FROM sensors WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices INNER JOIN locations ON devices.location = locations.location_id WHERE devices.device_id = 5;
SELECT analysis_name, result FROM analyses WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value, sensor_type FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING AVG(value) > 50 ORDER BY average_value DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, sensor_type, last_reading FROM sensors;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT * FROM readings WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY reading_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Kitchen' ORDER BY last_reading DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM readings WHERE value > 50 AND reading_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-05-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' AND location LIKE '%Room%' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, sensor_type, last_reading FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity' AND location = 'Bedroom' ORDER BY last_reading ASC;
